Class-Druid 20 -- Female Half-Elf Druid: 20
Strength: 19 (+4) Dexterity: 18 (+4) Constitution: 18 (+4) Intelligence: 18 (+4) Wisdom: 19 (+4) Charisma: 16 (+3)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)
Experience: 19500/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 9/14
Ability Notes:
Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 20 from any)
Feather Step: Can Step into difficult terrain
Woodland Stride: Moves normally over difficult terrain caused by plants or fungi
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 5; Class: 14; General: 5; Skill: 10 Selectable Feature Count: Druid (Order); Human (Heritage)

Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 5 selections
Animal: Has the Animal Companion feature
Clever Improviser: Has the Untrained Improvisation feature
Druid Feats: 10 selections
Druidic Order: 1 selection
General Feats: 5 selections
Half-Elf: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Leaf: Has the Leshy Familiar feature
Order Explorer (Animal): +1 Class Feat
Order Explorer (Leaf): +1 Class Feat
Order Explorer (Storm): +1 Class Feat
Order Explorer (Wild): +1 Class Feat
Skill Feats: 10 selections
Storm: Has the Storm Born feature
Wild: Has the Wild Shape feature
Anathema: May not perform acts or cast spells prohibited by druidic order
Animal Companion: Has a young animal companion
Enhanced Familiar: Can select 4 familiar or master abilities each day
Half-Elf: Has the elf trait and may take elf and half-elf feats
Incredible Companion: Animal Companion has a choice of nimble or savage characteristics
Leshy Familiar: Has a Tiny plant or fungus familiar
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Mature Animal Companion: Animal Companion is a mature companion and may Stride or Strike without a command
Order Explorer (Animal): Can select animal order feats
Order Explorer (Leaf): Can select leaf order feats
Order Explorer (Storm): Can select storm order feats
Order Explorer (Wild): Can select wild order feats
Specialized Companion: Animal Companion has a choice of specialization
Timeless Nature: Does not age
Train Animal: Can use days of training and a successful Nature check to teach an animal to perform a trick
Verdant Metamorphosis: Has plant, not humanoid, trait
Perception: +28 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +28 (dexterity; expert) Folktale Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Performance: +23 (charisma; untrained)
Alcohol Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Forest Lore: +28 (intelligence; expert) Religion: +28 (wisdom; expert)
Arcana: +24 (intelligence; untrained) Goblin Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Scribing Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Athletics: +26 (strength; trained) Intimidation: +27 (charisma; expert) Society: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Crafting: +26 (intelligence; trained) Labor Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Stealth: +24 (dexterity; untrained)
Deception: +23 (charisma; untrained) Medicine: +26 (wisdom; trained) Survival: +24 (wisdom; untrained)
Diplomacy: +25 (charisma; trained) Milling Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Thievery: +26 (dexterity; trained)
Elven Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Mining Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Underworld Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Engineering Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Nature: +28 (wisdom; expert) Vampire Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Farming Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Occultism: +24 (intelligence; untrained) Warfare Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Languages: Abyssal; Aquan; Common; Draconic; Druidic; Goblin; Sylvan
Skill Notes:
Alertness: Perception Expert
Animal: Skill Trained (Athletics)
Druid Skills: Skill Trained (Nature; Choose 6 from any)
Druidic Language: Knows a druid-specific language
Intelligence Language Bonus: +4 Language Count
Leaf: Skill Trained (Diplomacy)
Natural Skill: Skill Trained (Choose 2 from any)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 9 from any)
Skill Training (Crafting): Skill Trained (Crafting)
Skill Training (Labor Lore): Skill Trained (Labor Lore)
Skill Training (Society): Skill Trained (Society)
Skill Training (Vampire Lore): Skill Trained (Vampire Lore)
Skill Training (Warfare Lore): Skill Trained (Warfare Lore)
Storm: Skill Trained (Acrobatics)
Untrained Improvisation: +20 on untrained skill checks
Wild: Skill Trained (Intimidation)
Assurance (Athletics): Can take an automatic 32 on Athletics checks
Assurance (Religion): Can take an automatic 34 on Religion checks
Bargain Hunter: +2 initial gold/Can use Diplomacy to purchase items at a discount
Clever Improviser: May attempt any skill untrained
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Courtly Graces: Can use Society to impersonate a noble or to Make An Impression on one
Green Empathy: Can communicate with plants and fungi and gains +2 to make simple Requests
Storm Born: Suffers no Perception penalties from weather
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Wild Empathy: Can speak with animals
Combat
Hit Points: 248 Armor Class: 39 (dexterity (2 max); expert)
Armor: Scale Mail Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Heavy Crossbow (+28 1d10 P R120'; dexterity; expert); Javelin (+28 1d6+4 P R30'; dexterity; expert); Morningstar (+28 1d6+4 B/P; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Druid Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Medium Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Unconventional Weaponry (Bastard Sword): Weapon Familiarity (Bastard Sword)
Weapon Proficiency (Dwarven Waraxe): Attack Trained (Dwarven Waraxe)
Weapon Proficiency (Martial Weapons): Attack Trained (Martial Weapons)
Weapon Proficiency (Orc Necksplitter): Attack Trained (Orc Necksplitter)
Weapon Proficiency (Sawtooth Saber): Attack Trained (Sawtooth Saber)
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Side By Side: Self and companion automatically flank a foe adjacent to both
Storm Retribution: (R) Tempest Surge cast in response to a foe critical melee hit pushes the foe 5' (save Reflex negates; critical failure pushes 10')
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, or +4 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +28 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +28 (dexterity; expert); Will: +30 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Great Fortitude: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Resolve: Save Master (Will)
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation fails to Coerce are critical fails
Poison Resistance: Has poison resistance 10 and +1 saves vs. poison
Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Timeless Nature: +2 vs. disease and primal magic
Magic
Spell Slots: P10: 2; P1: 3; P2: 3; P3: 3; P4: 3; P5: 3; P6: 3; P7: 3; P8: 3; P9: 3; PC1: 5 Focus Points: 3 Attack: Primal: +32 (wisdom; legendary) Spell DC: Primal: 42 (wisdom; legendary)
Spells:
Goodberry (P1 Foc Nec): (2) Eating the touched piece of produce within 10 min restores 1d6+4 HP; 6 pieces also count as a full meal (heightened +1 affects +1 piece)
Heal Animal (P1 Foc Nec): (1) Touched animal (2 actions gives R30') regains 1d8 HP, or 1d8+8 HP with 2 actions (heightened +1 restores +1d8 HP or +1d8+8 HP)
Illusory Disguise (P1 Ill): (2) Makes self appear different and gives +24 Deception to avoid uncovering the disguise for 1 hr (heightened 2nd also disguises voice and scent; 3rd allows copying a specific individual)
Illusory Object (P1 Ill): (2) R500' Creates an image of a stationary object in a 20' burst for 10 min (heightened 2nd effects include sounds and smells and last for 1 hr; 5th effects are permanent)
Illusory Scene (P5 Ill): (10 min) R500' Creates in a 30' burst a moving illusion with up to 10 creatures or objects, sounds, and smells for 1 hr (heightened 6th creatures in the scene can speak; 8th effects are permanent)
Impaling Briars (P8 Foc Con): (2) 100' emanation inflicts difficult terrain, -10 Speed (save Reflex negates; critical failure inflicts immobilized for 1 rd), or greater difficult terrain, plus 10d6 HP piercing and -10' Speed on a target with a successful spell attack (or immobilized with a critical success), each rd while sustained for up to 1 min
Nature Incarnate (P10 Tra): (2) Self becomes a Medium green man or Gargantuan kaiju with 30 temporary HP, Armor Class 45, +34 attack, darkvision, +36 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific attacks for 1 min
Primal Summons (P6 Foc Con): (F) Subsequent Summon Animal or Summon Plant Or Fungus gives summoned creature one of: a 60' fly Speed; a 20' burrow Speed, -10' Speed, and resistance 5 to physical damage; +1d6 HP fire damage, resistance 10 to fire, and weakness 5 to cold and water; a 60' swim Speed, a Shove after a melee attack, and resistance 5 to fire
Storm Lord (P9 Foc Evo): (2) 100' emanation produces a bolt of lighting that inflicts 10d6 HP electricity and deafened for 1 rd (save basic Reflex) each rd while sustained for up to 1 min, plus a choice of weather: calm; foggy (conceals); rainy (inflicts -2 Acrobatics and Perception); or windy (inflicts -4 ranged attacks and difficult terrain for flying)
Stormwind Flight (P4 Foc Tra): (2) Self gains 25' fly Speed for 1 min (heightened 6th negates difficult terrain effects when flying against the wind)
Tempest Surge (P1 Foc Evo): (2) R30' Inflicts 1d12 HP electricity, clumsy 2 for 1 rd, and 1 HP persistent electricity (save basic Reflex inflicts initial HP only) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d12 HP initial and +1 HP persistent)
Veil (P4 Ill): (2) R30' Makes 10 creatures appear as different, similar creatures for 1 hr (heightened 5th also disguises voices and scents; 7th targets can appear to be familiar individuals)
Wild Morph (P1 Foc Tra): (1) Self gains claws that inflict 1d6 HP slashing (requires Wild Shape), jaws that inflict 1d8 HP piercing (requires Insect Shape), resistance 5 to critical hits and precision damage (requires Elemental Shape), 10' reach (requires Plant Shape), or a 30' fly Speed (requires Soaring Shape) for 1 min (heightened 6th may choose 2 effects, claws also inflict 2d6 HP persistent bleed damage, and jaws also inflict 2d6 HP persistent poison damage; 10th may choose 3 effects, claws also inflict 4d6 persistent bleed damage and jaws also inflict 4d6 HP persistent poison damage)
Wild Shape (P1 Foc Tra): (2) Transforms self into a Pest Form creature for 10 min or another creature for 1 min, gaining +2 attacks (heightened 2nd may transform into an Animal Form creature)
Magic Notes:
Animal: Knows the Heal Animal primal spell
Druidic Order: Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Primal)
Fey Caller: Knows the Illusory Disguise, Illusory Object, Illusory Scene, and Veil primal spells
Hierophant's Power: +1 10th level spell slot
Impaling Briars: Knows the Impaling Briars primal spell/+1 Focus Points
Invoke Disaster: Knows the Storm Lord primal spell/+1 Focus Points
Leaf: Knows the Goodberry primal spell/+1 Focus Points
Legendary Spellcaster: Spell Legendary (Primal)
Master Spellcaster: Spell Master (Primal)
Order Magic (Animal): Knows the Heal Animal primal spell
Order Magic (Leaf): Knows the Goodberry primal spell
Order Magic (Storm): Knows the Tempest Surge primal spell
Order Magic (Wild): Knows the Wild Morph primal spell
Primal Hierophant: Has 1 10th-level spell slot
Primal Summons: Knows the Primal Summons primal spell
Storm: Knows the Tempest Surge primal spell/+1 Focus Points
True Shapeshifter: Knows the Nature Incarnate primal spell; can use it to become a kaiju or green man once per day
Wild Shape: Knows the Wild Shape primal spell
Wild: Knows the Wild Morph primal spell
Wind Caller: Knows the Stormwind Flight primal spell/+1 Focus Points
Call Of The Wild: Can spend 10 min in concert with nature to replace a prepared spell with Summon Animal or Summon Plant Or Fungus of the same level
Dragon Shape: Can use Wild Shape to change into a Large dragon, and Wild Shape gives resistance 5 to a choice of acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison
Effortless Concentration: (F) Sustains an active spell
Elemental Shape: Can use Wild Shape to change into a Medium elemental, and Wild Shape gives resistance 5 to fire
Ferocious Shape: Can use Wild Shape to change into a Large dinosaur, and Wild Shape Athletics bonus increases by 1
Form Control: (1) Subsequent Wild Shape, cast 2 levels lower, lasts for 1 hr
Green Tongue: Self and any leshy familiar have continuous Speak With Plants effects
Healing Transformation: (1) Subsequent non-cantrip polymorph spell restores 1d6 Hit Poins per spell level
Insect Shape: Can use Wild Shape to change into a Medium insect; flightless forms last 24 hr
Leyline Conduit: (1) Subsequent casting of an instantaneous spell of 5th level or lower does not expend a spell slot once per min
Monstrosity Shape: Can use Wild Shape to change into a phoenix, purple worm, or sea serpent
Overwhelming Energy: (1) Subsequent spell ignores resistance 20 to energy
Perfect Form Control: Can retain Form Control shape permanently
Plant Shape: Can use Wild Shape to change into a Large plant, and Wild Shape gives resistance 5 to poison
Primal Focus: Refocus restores 2 Focus Points
Primal Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the primal tradition
Primal Wellspring: Refocus restores 3 Focus Points
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Soaring Shape: Can use Wild Shape to change into a wasp, pterosaur, bat or bird, and Wild Shape Acrobatics bonus increases by 1
Steady Spellcasting: Successful DC 15 flat check negates spellcasting disruption
Storm Born: Suffers no ranged spell penalties from weather
Thousand Faces: Can use Wild Shape to change into a Small or Medium humanoid
True Shapeshifter: (2) Changes shape during Wild Shape
Verdant Metamorphosis: Can use Tree Shape effects at will; tree form raises Armor Class to 30, restores half Hit Points with 10 min in sunlight, and restores all Hit Points and removes all non-permanent conditions and poisons and diseases up to level 19 with daily rest
Widen Spell: (1) Increases the effect of a subsequent 10' or greater radius area spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone spell by 5', or the effect of a longer line or cone spell by 10'
Notes
